---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv("Data.csv") %>% select(c("Property.number", "Property.Value", "Land.Value")) # remove 78802
```

```{r}
data
```

```{r}
model <- lm(Land.Value ~ Property.Value, data = data)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```

```{r}
plot(data$Land.Value, data$Property.Value)
abline(model)
```

```{r}
predict(model, newdata = based)
```

```{r}
based <- data.frame(
  Property.Value = c(2000000)
)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(model, file = "LandValEstimator.RDS")
```
